title: No Pogačar, No Third Grand Tour Win, but UAE Team Emirates Is Still Shining in Vuelta a España
content:
Stage win for Marc Soler and mountains jersey for Jay Vine on Covadonga see the 'super team' refusing to give up after GC chances look slim.

Read the full article at No Pogačar, No Third Grand Tour Win, but UAE Team Emirates Is Still Shining in Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: sstokes
